tool_description: Send SMS to any number globally from your application through ShoutOUT SMS API
name: ShoutOUT SMS
title: ShoutOUT SMS

api_list.name: Send an SMS
api_list.description: Send sms to given mobile number(s).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shoutout-sms.p.rapidapi.com/messages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shoutout-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shoutout-sms.p.rapidapi.com/messages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shoutout-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
